TEXT.TITLE: CLEVITE <CLEV> FORMS JOINT VENTURE
TEXT.BODY:
Clevite Industries Inc said it agreed in principle to form a joint venture company with Bridgestone Corp of Tokyo. Based in Milan, Ohio, the joint venture company, Clevite-Bridgestone Co, will manufacture and sell rubber-to-metal products for the automotive industry in the United States, Canada and Mexico. Initially, it said the new company will manufacture products in Clevite's existing Angola, Ind. plant.
